title: why i got banned before being gold ? (screen shots & video)
body:
well was just playing a game as support and we started pretty good as the team ranks were gold and silver and i only need 1 win to enter the GOLD promo, jinx the ADC died after brand stunned her and ezreal used his ultimate, then died again when she did the same mistake, and again when VI ganked, then the worst time when we pinged because oriana was about to come from the mid we spammed and i told her SHE IS COMING RUN she just ignored and died then said report support after this she trolled at the end her score was 2/20/2 with 2 KS obviously yet i am the one who got PERM BAN for what? for saying this words
Report jinx for (Flame/Feed/Troll/Toxic)
links:(https://i.imgur.com/dTxYxAR.png
https://i.imgur.com/ZlO6wOm.jpg

do the mods really check ALL THE CHAT before banning someone or its just random? don't believe she trolls? video link : https://www.mediafire.com/file/n5qtyp1p2n8alux/EUN1-1838813389.rofl 

i am sure the mods can RECHECK the chat and see who flammed for real

1 game to reach S1 Promo and i play with this troller who just trolled intentionally not having a bad game, he really wanna troll put your self in my place 12 hours for new season and you need 1 win to reach promo and play with a toxic feeder, someone might see the chat and say i am spamming "REPORT JINX" first watch the video, 2nd my chat is clean for what my team said when she said "I GO FEED"  so if riot consider my chat is toxic, then we all should be banned which really nonsense because we are not who ruined the game beside all of this if i was toxic why did  "ALL THE TEAM" honored me? we really did our best to win this game and survived for 30min but this intentional feed was ABOVE the limit.. beside all this it's only 1 CHAT the only needed 1 chat so i get banned while i have all the right to flame and curse like the team did because it's really sick move to do in ranked instead i just repeated that she should be reported and talking about the reality and just 12 hour before the season end i got banned?

replies.body:
1.  You need to hide the names of all players in your screenshot that are not you to stay in accordance with board rules.

2.  Can you please include screenshots or a link to your chat logs that are used as evidence in the ban?  Yes, we can see the ADC was 2/21, yes we can see that you were banned but we don't have the full logs so we only have your story to go by.  If you truly want people's opinion on the matter, I'd include the chat logs as well.
You don't need to block out the names if you arent shaming.
If the person being revealed did not consent to being revealed and the information revealed about them could be construed in a negative light, it is against the rules.

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-07T17:00:00.535+0000)
>
> If the person being revealed did not consent to being revealed and the information revealed about them could be construed in a negative light, it is against the rules.

i played with a troller why should others do that? atleast they can "dodge" if he played with him instead of losing
Can you please clarify what you mean? Something about that comment got lost in translation.

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-07T18:17:50.420+0000)
>
> Can you please clarify what you mean? Something about that comment got lost in translation.

i already played with a guy who trolled and his name shown above why should other play with him? seeing his name will make him avoid losing this game simply

Oh I see, so you believe that you are doing everyone a service, by revealing the troll so that others will know to not play with them?

That is a good sentiment. But in actuality it does not help at all. The matchmaking system assigns teams randomly. Players have no way to avoid the 'troll' until they see them in champion select, and it is highly unlikely unlikely for anyone who gets matched with that player to also see your post and know to dodge the match.

On top of that, revealing a player's information online does harm, because it gives others the opportunity to harass them.

Conclusion: It does more harm than good, so posting on the boards to reveal trolls is not worthwhile.

If you want them to be investigated you can always submit a support ticket to Riot. That would be much more effective for getting them out of peoples' matches.

> [{quoted}](name=NF Kuddles,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-07T14:25:16.751+0000)
>
> 1.  You need to hide the names of all players in your screenshot that are not you to stay in accordance with board rules.
> 
> 2.  Can you please include screenshots or a link to your chat logs that are used as evidence in the ban?  Yes, we can see the ADC was 2/21, yes we can see that you were banned but we don't have the full logs so we only have your story to go by.  If you truly want people's opinion on the matter, I'd include the chat logs as well.

from where i get it?

> [{quoted}](name=xBlackHammer,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-07T14:35:22.420+0000)
>
> from where i get it?

You could have copied and pasted from the log that was provided.  I believe you can put in a support ticket requesting the chat logs although I'm not overly familiar with this process.
To be fair you need to be reported several times so get banned this obv isnt your first time getting reported even tho it might be false u still have been reported enough times to deserve it

**No, you don't.**Riot announced in December, 2016 that you can be permabanned of one game if your behavior is deemed extreme by their arbitrary and non-trasparent system of what is considered extreme. I personally was permabanned last year. There was two games in my log report. In the first game, confirmed by Riot Economics, I triggered the scan by saying "report caitlyn" He refered to this as "witch-hunting" It should be noted that I was playing caitlyn, and this was clearly a joke. 

In the second game, I was autofilled to jungle. Despite doing fine, the team I was on took it upon themselves to flame me until I opted to take 2 minutes to "Vent" before using Mute All and winning the game.

On that account, I had never had even a chat restriction. I'm routinely a very positive and easy going player, however, in Riot's words, 

" Our research shows that many players have occasional toxic moments and do get reported, just not as frequently, and we certainly don't want to boot these folks. We all have bad days, and sometimes just need a slight attitude adjustment." -11-16-12

Clearly, there stance has changed.

> [{quoted}](name=Chibi Ðeviljho,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-07T16:01:32.344+0000)
>
> **No, you don't.**Riot announced in December, 2016 that you can be permabanned of one game if your behavior is deemed extreme by their arbitrary and non-trasparent system of what is considered extreme. I personally was permabanned last year. There was two games in my log report. In the first game, confirmed by Riot Economics, I triggered the scan by saying "report caitlyn" He refered to this as "witch-hunting" It should be noted that I was playing caitlyn, and this was clearly a joke. 
> 
> In the second game, I was autofilled to jungle. Despite doing fine, the team I was on took it upon themselves to flame me until I opted to take 2 minutes to "Vent" before using Mute All and winning the game.
> 
> On that account, I had never had even a chat restriction. I'm routinely a very positive and easy going player, however, in Riot's words, 
> 
> " Our research shows that many players have occasional toxic moments and do get reported, just not as frequently, and we certainly don't want to boot these folks. We all have bad days, and sometimes just need a slight attitude adjustment." -11-16-12
> 
> Clearly, there stance has changed.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GErabj54,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-08-21T06:58:37.753+0000)
>
> This thread is _two years old_.

Oh he knows.
I just noticed Tbh

The vast majority of the game is spent harassing and complaining about lux and jinx, calling for reports against them and using that as a leaping off point for your harassment. Even if they were behaving poorly you harassing them over it will change nothing except make it more likely that they continue with that behavior now that they've gotten a negative reaction out of you. Also, you seem to be under the belief that multiple reports in a game lead to a punishment: that's not true, as it only takes 1 report to flag a game for review (keyword: review), and if punish worthy behavior is found in that game and multiple games then that's when the player gets punished.

Yes trolls stink and are annoying and frustrating to play with and we've all experienced it at one point or another. However, there are better ways of handling it then spending all game harassing the trolls and calling for reports against them. Next time I would suggest finding other ways to vent your frustration rather than using the in-game chat to do so, as that time is better spent playing the actual game itself. In this case the punishment is deserved.

P.S. You weren't punished for this one game, but for multiple games of displaying poor behavior.
